title: Dream Fulfiller of the Myriad Worlds - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: 棉衣卫
description:
Self-Destruction, Hair Growing Art, Disintegration, Mind Readee, Being Barehanded Blade Blocked… are my golden fingers!

Helping a woman get pregnant with Li Xunhuan’s child; taking a ten-year-old girl to conquer the world of Kick-Ass; assisting clients to obtain Bu Jingyun’s Kirin Arm… are my daily work.

Breaking down the plot, killing the protagonist, and destroying the rules of the world… are my rules of conduct.

I am Li Mu, who uses the lamest skills to do the most difficult job! I am the most powerful (evil) Dream Fulfiller, and I am good at helping you fulfill your dreams (and better at managing clients). Please cherish it when we meet for the first time!>
